segments.text: I'm standing here, just observing this kitchen scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The first thing I notice is the sink, overflowing relentlessly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is sheeting down the cabinet doors, forming a growing puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s astounding that the woman at the sink hasn’t noticed a thing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is practically submerged, yet her attention is solely on that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how calmly she continues to dry it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Don't people usually react when their kitchen floods?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A wave of worry washes over me as I imagine the damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of her slipping on that wet floor makes my stomach clench.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is a disaster waiting to happen, right under her nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone be so utterly unaware of their surroundings?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to shout and warn her about the impending mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water continues to flow, a silent, steady stream of trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's truly a bizarre display of domestic obliviousness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a strange scenario to witness.
segments.speaker: PAR
